meanings.definition: The practice of cultivating aquatic animals and plants for food or other purposes.
meanings.sent1: Aquafarming involves raising fish and seaweed for people to eat.
meanings.sent2: Many coastal communities rely on aquafarming to provide fresh seafood.
meanings.sent3: The underwater farmers were so successful with aquafarming that they had a seafood feast every week.
meanings.sent4: In the world of aquafarming, the fish are the prized possessions of the farmers.
meanings.sent5: The colorful underwater world of aquafarming is a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The business or industry of aquaculture.
meanings.sent1: Aquafarming has become a profitable industry in many countries.
meanings.sent2: Investing in aquafarming can be a smart financial decision.
meanings.sent3: The competition between aquafarming companies was fierce, but friendly.
meanings.sent4: The growth of the aquafarming business is like a wave spreading across the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The future of sustainable food production lies in the hands of aquafarming.
